CHAT.comment: GLEN SCOTT MILNER, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF THE NAVY
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID S. MANN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANTHONY A. YANG ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID S. MANN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 10:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
